name: Rob Hoerntlein
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can refer business clients needing professional services or expertise. Limited profile data suggests openness to cross-referral arrangements with professionals in aligned business service areas.
what_you_do: Rob Hoerntlein provides a step-by-step guide for creating a cyberpunk-themed studio, blending DIY projects with retro-futuristic aesthetics.
who_you_serve: Individuals of all ages interested in DIY projects, particularly those who enjoy retro and sci-fi themes, including grandparents and their grandchildren.
